name: Dino Diction
description:
A cute word game where you are given the definition of a word, and you have to guess that word. Compete with people across the Internet by trying to get the highest scores in certain modes. Recommended for ages 10+

Comment any bugs or issues that you may find. Describe when and where the issue ocurred and I will fix it asap.

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1eao9WTq8J3-EDzBwX7p-GPwnI5_RAh1x09Fd1JAA...

^^^That is the spreadsheet containing all of the words. Use it to study for the game.

PC only

Tutorial that helps new players acclimate to the game

10 game modes

Nearly 3,000 words

Multiplayer
